sentences.english: Creative sketchbook allows you to draw websites and web apps.
sentences.chinese: 很有创意的速写册，可供你画出网址和网页应用软件。

sentences.english: He is going to make some lists in his sketch-book.
sentences.chinese: 他打算在他的速写薄上列一张表。

sentences.english: Take a picture or sketch the flower instead of picking it.
sentences.chinese: 可以照张相或是画张速写，但不要去摘花。

sentences.english: Burton always carries his dense, pocket-size sketchbook with him.
sentences.chinese: 伯顿总是随身带着的厚厚的，口袋大小的速写本。

sentences.english: The art students sketched the people in the parade as it passed.
sentences.chinese: 那些学美术的学生在游行队伍经过时画了速写。

sentences.english: You create half a dozen character sketches every time you attend a wedding or a funeral.
sentences.chinese: 参加婚礼或葬礼时，你总能画出半打人物速写画。

sentences.english: I sketched inattentively along the margins of my homework.
sentences.chinese: 我一时大意，在我的家庭作业的空白处画起速写来。

sentences.english: I'm kind of addict to the nature, so I drew those sketches!
sentences.chinese: 现在又迷上了大自然，于是画了张动物的速写。

sentences.english: He sketched a boy's head on the sketchpad .
sentences.chinese: 他在速写簿上画出了男孩头像素描。

sentences.english: He sketched many of the unusual artifacts found at el Amarna .
sentences.chinese: 他为在阿玛那发现的很多不寻常的人工制品画了速写。

sentences.english: The sketch book is part of me, a on-going diary.
sentences.chinese: 速写本是我的一部分，一个持续的日记。

sentences.english: Profile perspectives are important in fashion illustration croquis.
sentences.chinese: 简介观点时装画速写重要。

sentences.english: Sketch is one of the important courses in artistic specialties in institutions of higher learning.
sentences.chinese: 速写写生是高校美术专业的重要课程之一。

sentences.english: Sketchbooks are an ideal place to experiment.
sentences.chinese: 速写本是你理想的试验场。

definition: to sketch from nature/to do a still life drawing
gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
to copy (a model of calligraphy or painting etc)
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to make a draft/to draft (a document)
